verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiu, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w censers|strong="H4289"\w*, \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* therein, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*, \w offering|strong="H7126"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w coming|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*: \w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w approach|strong="H7138"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w glorified|strong="H3513"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* heard \w this|strong="H1931"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w held|strong="H3513"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* peace.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Misael \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Elisaphan, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Oziel, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Go|strong="H7126"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* without \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w* forthwith \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* lay, vested \w with|strong="H0413"\w* linen tunicks, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* cast \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w forth|strong="H5375"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: Uncover \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* rend \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, lest perhaps \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* indignation come \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*. \w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w bewail|strong="H1058"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w burning|strong="H8316"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* kindled:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, \w otherwise|strong="H6435"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* perish, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* holy unction \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* precept \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*:

\w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* thing \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* make \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w*, thou \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* testimony, lest \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: \w because|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* precept \w through|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*:

\w And|strong="H6944"\w* \w that|strong="H6944"\w* \w you|strong="H0914"\w* \w may|strong="H2889"\w* have knowledge \w to|strong="H0914"\w* discern \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w and|strong="H6944"\w* unholy, \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w and|strong="H6944"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* ordinances \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*, \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*: \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w remaining|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* oblation \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* without leaven \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w holies|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* oblations \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w been|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w me|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w breast|strong="H2373"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w offered|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* shoulder \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* separated, \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* most \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, thou \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* aside \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thee \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* victims \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* elevated \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* shoulder \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w breast|strong="H2373"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* burnt \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* altar, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w belong|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H0801"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* law, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w While|strong="H2009"\w* \w these|strong="H0175"\w* things \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* doing, \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* buck \w goat|strong="H8163"\w*, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* been offered \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* found \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w being|strong="H1121"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sacrifice \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w pray|strong="H5375"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w Especially|strong="H0853"\w* whereas \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof hath \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w carried|strong="H0935"\w* \w within|strong="H6441"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* places, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* ought \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*?

\w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* answered: \w This|strong="H0428"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* hath \w been|strong="H3068"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* victim \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* holocaust \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w what|strong="H1696"\w* thou seest \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w happened|strong="H7122"\w*: how could \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w*, \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w please|strong="H3190"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ceremonies, having \w a|strong="H7126"\w* sorrowful heart?

\w Which|strong="H5869"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H4872"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H3190"\w*.
